LanguageData.Config_Applied_Check_ConfigsApplied: Don't warn about missing pack config
LanguageData.Config_Applied_Check_ConfigsApplied_Warn:
If you are seeing this message while trying to play along with a modpack it means you probably haven't downloaded or correctly applied the recommended configs. Please make sure you have followed the mod configs section of the pack setup instructions

If you are not playing along with a modpack and have just downloaded pack for your own playthrough, that's great! Sorry for the inconvenience!

If you'd like to permanently disable this warning without downloading the configs for the pack simply remove the Config Applied Check mod or tick the box marked "Don't warn about missing pack config" in the Config Applied Check settings.
